title: Rectal prolapse
summary: Rectal prolapse is when the rectal walls have prolapsed to a degree where they protrude out the anus and are visible outside the body.[2] However, most researchers agree that there are 3 to 5 different types of rectal prolapse, depending on if the prolapsed section is visible externally, and if the full or only partial thickness of the rectal wall is involved.[3][4]
